attributes.action: Resign or call a general election immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our once great country has been destroyed by successive years of disastrous mismanagement by this government and especially by the prime minister during his time whilst holding that office and the office of Chancellor of the Exchequer.   We call on him to resign or call a general election immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
